channel.title: Need coding help!
channel.description:
Ok here is the problem..
I made a server. I got onto it. I made myself an admin. I cant spawn..
I need someone to give me the code so that I can spawn on my server.
Also If someone gives me the code.. Where do I paste it into???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 08:00:14 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help???

item.title: Need coding help!
item.dc:creator: @Carly Carly
item.description:
@Carly wrote:

In Your Client.java Replace The Pickup Command With This

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && ( playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

Read full topic
